department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Repair, refit and conversions of ships and Vessels
description: Carry out work on the CCGS S.W. Grenfell in accordance with the associated technical specifications detailed in Annex A; and carry out Unscheduled Work authorized by the Contracting Authority.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: CCGS S.W. Grenfell - Dry Docking**
--------------------------------------------------------

**Procurement Information:**
--------------------------------------------------------

*   **Procurement Title:** CCGS S.W. Grenfell - Dry Docking
*   **Name of Purchaser:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   **Postal Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 
*   **Purchase Date:** 2022-09-19
*   **Closing Date and Time for Bids:** 2022-10-21T17:00:00
*   **Status Notice:** Expired

**Trade Agreement:**
--------------------------------------------------------

This procurement will be governed by, and any contract resulting from this procurement will be subject to, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Type of Tender and Procurement Method:**
------------------------------------------------------------

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under a Competitive - Open Bidding process.

**Selection Criteria:**
--------------------------------------------------------

The lowest price will be the sole criteria for evaluating proposals.

**Area of Origin:**
--------------------------------------------------------

The procurement is subject to the requirements of Article 3.170.10(b) of the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Supply Manual and will be limited to suppliers located in the area of origin of the ship, which is Western Canada.

**Nature of Requirements:**
--------------------------------------------------------

The CCGS S.W. Grenfell will require dry docking services to be performed from December 21, 2022, to February 15, 2023.

Bidder Capabilities:
--------------------------------------------------------

Bidders must provide details of their capabilities and how they will deliver the required goods and services.

Security Requirements:
--------------------------------------------------------

There are no security requirements applicable to this Contract.

**Procurement Category:**
--------------------------------------------------------

This procurement falls under Category SRVTGD.

**Notice Type:**
--------------------------------------------------------

This is a Request for Proposal.

**Tender Description:**
--------------------------------------------------------

The Statement of Work is as follows:

(a) To carry out work on the CCGS S.W. Grenfell in accordance with the associated technical specifications detailed in Annex A; and

(b) To carry out Unscheduled Work authorized by the Contracting Authority.

**Delivery Location:**
--------------------------------------------------------

The delivery location is at the CCGS S.W. Grenfell, located in the area of origin of the ship.

--------------------------------------------------------
